title: Sinners’ Holiday (restored, colorized) (1930, pre-code crime, imdb score: 6.3)

sources.title: Sinners’ Holiday (restored, colorized) (1930, pre-code crime, imdb score: 6.3)
sources.description: Sinners' Holiday is a 1930 American pre-Code all-talking crime drama film starring Grant Withers and Evalyn Knapp , and featuring James Cagney (in his film debut), Lucille La Verne , and Joan Blondell . It is based on the 1930 play Penny Arcade by Marie Baumer. Both Cagney and Blondell reprised the roles they played in the original Broadway production. [1] [2]
